summary: The video features a discussion among individuals regarding their views on unions and their support for Donald Trump. One person, who has been working in a union since 1988, explains how union members increasingly supported Trump due to his focus on bringing jobs back to America, despite his lack of direct support for unions. This individual emphasizes that job creation is more important than union support itself. Another participant, an accountant for unions, supports unions but acknowledges that Trump does not. A third person, who was once a union member, expresses skepticism about unions, believing they protect lazy workers. The conversation is candid, with some participants expressing differing opinions while others avoid controversial topics.
keywords: Trump, unions, job creation, pro-American policies, Clinton, NAFTA, Joe Biden, Republicans, conflict of interest, accounting, Safeway, Grocery Stars, hard work
